name: Player
text: Hello, can I order my favourite butter chicken?

name: al' Pachino
text: Sorry... We don't have butter chicken no more

name: al' Pachino
text: Seems like there are no chickens left in this valley(

name: Player
text: F*CK NO. Is there any place where I can get the BUTTER CHICKEN?

name: al' Pachino
text: Yes, there is one, but it's faaaar away from here.

name: Player
text: Where? Tell me. I'll get there.

name: al' Pachino
text: HAHAHA. You fool. You ain't ready for this.

name: Player
text: OH I AM READY FOR ANYTHING TO GET THE BUTTER CHICKEN!!!

name: al' Pachino
text: Okay. But it's gonna be a long journey.

name: al' Pachino
text: First, you need to go across the wide river.

name: al' Pachino
text: Then it's gonna be the Dark Forest.

name: al' Pachino
text: And finally, the Cringerest - the highest mountain in the world.

name: al' Pachino
text: Your butter chicken will be waiting for you there. Good luck
